faq.haveQuestionsAboutCreatingYourGame: Have questions about creating your game? We’ve got you covered! Find answers to the most common questions below, or contact us for more information.
faq.question1: 1. How does the game creation process work?
faq.answer1: he process is quick and simple. Once you select your options in the “Create Game” section, our team starts developing immediately. You’ll receive your game within 24 hours. If we fail to deliver on time, you get a full refund and still keep the game.
faq.question2: 2. How long does it take to get my game?
faq.answer2: We guarantee delivery within 24 hours after completing the “Create Game” form and making payment.
faq.answer3: We currently support PC, Web, and Android. iOS support is coming soon.
faq.question4: 4. Can I customize the design of my game?
faq.answer4: Yes, you can fully customize colors, logos, visuals, and other elements to reflect your brand or style.
faq.question5: 5. What happens if the game isn’t finished within 24 hours?
faq.answer5: If we don’t complete the game on time, we’ll refund your payment while you still receive your game.
faq.question6: 6. Can you help with publishing the game on Play Store or App Store?
faq.answer6: Publishing on Play Store may take longer due to administrative processes. However, we can provide an .apk file for testing before official publishing.
faq.question7: 7. Can I use my own images and music in the game?
faq.answer7: Absolutely! You can upload your own logos, images, and copyright-free music for full customization.
faq.question8: 8. What are the costs of your services?
faq.answer8: Basic games for PC/Web or Android start at $300. For detailed pricing, including add-ons like leaderboards or in-game shops, check the “Pricing” section.
